short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds extra functionality to the web forum Looksmax.me

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
• Quick Reply: Instantly reply to forum posts with common one-liners

• Post author and post footer action bar sticks to viewport while scrolling long posts

• See more user stats like member age, rot ratio, rep per post, rep per hour online, rep per day since join, posts per hour online, and posts per day since join

• Ability to hide reactions received in alerts menu and alerts page

• Button to open users’ full-size avatar images
